question: Sudhir Dhar, who passed away recently, was the renowned personality of which field?
explanation: Renowned cartoonist Sudhir Dhar (87) has passed away in Gurgaon on 26th of November 2019. His works graced several newspapers in a career spanning 58 years. He began his career with The Statesman in 1961 after which he moved to Hindustan Times.Â  His cartoons have also appeared in The Independent, The Pioneer, Delhi Times, New York Times, Washington Post and Saturday Review among others.
